questions.question: What kind of paint brands do you use?
questions.answer: We exclusively use premium-quality paints from trusted brands like **Sherwin-Williams** and **Benjamin Moore**. We select specific products based on your project needs, surface type, and desired finish, prioritizing durability, color retention, and environmental safety (low-VOC options available).

questions.question: How do you prepare surfaces for painting?
questions.answer: Meticulous preparation is the cornerstone of a lasting finish. Our process includes thorough cleaning, scraping loose paint, sanding, patching holes and cracks, repairing drywall, and applying high-quality primers where necessary. We also protect all non-painted surfaces (flooring, furniture, landscaping) with masking and drop cloths.

questions.question: Do I need to move furniture before interior painting?
questions.answer: While we appreciate clients moving small, delicate, or valuable items, Joe the Painter will handle the moving and covering of larger furniture and flooring to protect them throughout the painting process. We ensure everything is returned to its original place upon completion.

questions.question: How long does a typical painting project take?
questions.answer: The duration of a painting project varies greatly depending on the size of the area, the complexity of the work, and the extent of surface preparation required. During your free consultation, Joe will provide a detailed timeline specific to your project, ensuring clear expectations.
